mapper.select: SELECT smlt.type_code AS smlt_type_code, smlt.`name` AS smlt_name, smlt.description AS smlt_description, smlt.object_version_number AS smlt_object_version_number, smlv.value_code AS smlv_value_code, smlv.type_code AS smlv_type_code, smlv.`name` AS smlv_name, smlv.description AS smlv_description, smlv.object_version_number AS smlv_object_version_number FROM state_machine_lookup_type smlt LEFT JOIN state_machine_lookup_value smlv ON smlt.type_code = smlv.type_code WHERE smlt.type_code = #{typeCode}
